description: It is generated when a client succeeded to logon.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaClientLogon H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaClientMacAddr s EXAMPL RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaVlanID i 9999

description: The MAC address of the client.
variables.name: H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaClientMacAddr

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr

description: The Vlan ID associate with the port and the MAC address.
variables.name: H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaVlanID

description: It is generated when a client failed to logon, the h3cWaReasonCode
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaClientLogonFail H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaClientMacAddr s EXAMPL RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaVlanID i 9999 H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaReasonCode i 1

description: The MAC address of the client.
variables.name: H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaClientMacAddr

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr

description: The Vlan ID associate with the port and the MAC address.
variables.name: H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaVlanID

description: The code indicates the reason for the action of this trap.
The global number of connections is up to max.
The global number of connections is up to configured max value.
The interface number of connections is up to max.
The username or password is too long or username is empty.
The online time is over the max value.
There was no data flow for the connection.
Web authentication was disabled on interface.
The interface VLAN value was changed.
variables.name: H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaReasonCode

description: It is generated when a client logout, the h3cWaReasonCode
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaClientLogout H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaClientMacAddr s EXAMPL RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaVlanID i 9999 H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaReasonCode i 1

description: The MAC address of the client.

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr

description: The Vlan ID associate with the port and the MAC address.
variables.name: H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaVlanID

description: The code indicates the reason for the action of this trap.
The global number of connections is up to max.
The global number of connections is up to configured max value.
The interface number of connections is up to max.
The username or password is too long or username is empty.
The online time is over the max value.
There was no data flow for the connection.
Web authentication was disabled on interface.
The interface VLAN value was changed.

description: It is generated when a system action was occurred, the h3cWaActionCode
The code indicates the system action.
variables.name: H3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::h3cWaActionCode
